entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
